Package org.jpac.plc

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IoSignal  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Address
    represents the address of a data item stored in a plc or i/o device
    BitRxTx
    Used to transfer a bit value (boolean) between the java application and the plc.
    ByteRxTx
    Used to transfer a byte value between the java application and the plc.
    Connection
    represents a TCP/IP connection to a plc or to a i/o device.
    Data
    used as a data storage for data interchanged with a plc.
    DintRxTx
    Used to transfer a signed 32 bit integer (DINT) value between the java application and the plc.
    DwordRxTx
    Used to transfer an unsigned 32 bit value (DWORD) between the java application and the plc.
    IntRxTx
    Used to transfer a signed 16 bit (INT) value between the java application and the plc.
    IoCharString  
    IoDecimal  
    IoGeneric<ValueImpl>  
    IoLogical  
    IoSignedInteger  
    LobRxTx
    Used to transfer a large data item between the java application and the plc or other device.
    PlcString
    represents a plc string
    a plc string consists of a byte array containing the string
    and 2 additional maintenance bytes, used to store the maximum and current length of the string
    ReadRequest
    represents a read request.
    ReceiveTransaction
    represents a receive transaction
    Request
    represents a i/o request
    RequestSet
    represents a set of requests handled be the ReadMultipleData or WriteMultipleData
    RxTx
    Used to transfer data between the java application and the plc.
    StringRxTx
    Used to transfer a string value between the java application and the plc.
    Transaction
    represents an i/o transaction
    TransmitTransaction
    represents a transmit transaction
    WordRxTx
    Used to transfer a word value between the java application and the plc Can be used standalone or in the context of a complex data structure (STRUCT)
    WriteRequest
    represents a write request.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Data.Endianness  
    IoDirection  
    PLCConnectionType  
    Request.DATATYPE  
    Types  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AddressException
    is thrown, if the address of a data item cannot be properly resolved, while accessing data on external i/o device
    AddressOutOfRangeException
    thrown in cases, where a requested address can not be accessed by the PLC
    StringLengthException
    thrown, if the maximum size of a plc string would be exceeded while writing a java string to the plc
    TooManyRequestsException
    throw, if the overall size of requests stored inside a request set would exceed the user data size of a pdu, if an additional request would be added
    ValueOutOfRangeException
    thrown, if given parameter or a given combination of parameters are inconsistent
    WrongOrdinaryException
    thrown, if an enum does not contain a value with a given ordinary
